Split PDF files and extract specific pages. Select individual pages or enter page ranges to create a new PDF with only the pages you need.

Runs locally — no uploads. Your PDFs never leave your device.

How this PDF Split tool works

This tool uses your browser's built-in PDF processing capabilities to extract specific pages from your PDF document. All processing happens locally in your browser - your PDF never leaves your device, ensuring complete privacy and security.

Supported features

Select individual pages using checkboxes, use "Select All" or "Clear All" buttons, or enter page ranges (like 1-3,5,7-9). The extracted pages will be saved as a new PDF file while preserving the original quality.
